summary: Blonde (with Dark Hair Option), hot (CBBE compatible), and ready to slay dragons.
descriptionHtml:
After having used so many great mods I decided to try to give a little back in the form of my saved character, hope everyone enjoys my taste! Thanks to all the modders that made her possible! Cara is at the waterfall not far from the intro. There are two versions of her, the main one which is blonde, and a second one that I thought looked alot like Kate from Underworld, check the pictures to decide which you want. If you enjoy her please be sure to endorse it so more people find it in the search!

(UPDATE) I added a \"max talent\" Version of Cara which has all the talents maxxed out, shes still lvl one and will level normally, but will have a pretty big advantage from the start, for all those who like playing a \"goddess\" toon thats way op for its level.

(UPDATE) Because of requests I have created 2 replacer characters to bring Cara into the game as a follower. They can be downloaded at the following link...


Mods used for the picture... (there are alot, took me a while to get her perfect, try to load them in the order listed to be sure your save game looks the same as mine)

AOF Believable Hair -Female and Male (by AnOldFriend)
No More Blocky Faces - No_More_Blocky_Faces-1_50 (by Xenius)
Better Females by Bella - Better Females by Bella Version 3 (by BellaGail)
Better Females by Bella - Less Make up Version 2 (by BellaGail)
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- - Caliente Female Body Mod BBE v3 (by Caliente)
CBBE skin texture V2 and V3 support - CBBE skin texture v1_4 universal (by navetsea)
High Quality Eyes - High_Quality_Eyes-1_20 (by Xenius)
Really Smooth Female Faces - Really Smooth Female Faces V3 (by Zalzama)

CBBE Daedric Female - Daedric Female Armor v3 (by Laxi2610)
Daedric female armor replacer - DaedricFemaleArmor (by MaikCG)
Daedric female armor replacer - DaedricFemaleArmor_v2 (by MaikCG)
author: speedaemonc4
